jl_cockpit.visualiser — Method
visualiser(; vis_loss::Observable{Vector{Float32}} = nothing, vis_grad_norm::Observable{Vector{Float32}} = nothing)

Initialises the visualiser. It will take the given Observables and display a plot that updates live.

Base.push! — Method

jl_cockpit.accuracy — Method
This function calculates the accuracy of the model on test data
source
jl_cockpit.loss_plot! — Method
This function plots the loss of the plot data and axis
source
jl_cockpit.preprocess — Method
This function preprocesses features x and labels y from the given dataset for the training.
It transforms x into a 28x28 matrix and y into a 10-class vector.
source
jl_cockpit.training_loop — Method
This function trains the data in a loop
Call this function with optional parameters
source
